content: the pattern is available for free on my blog > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 4 ** ** you can watch the free video tutorial here 1 ** **about the pattern** this chic and modern crochet rectangle bag is made by working from corner to corner and creates a beautiful textured fabric this crochet bag pattern creates a big enough bag to carry all your essentials with style **skill level** - intermediate **crochet terminology** - the pattern is written using english u s terminology **materials needed** - hooks size needed 4 5 mm - worsted #4 weight cotton yarn i used knit picks dishie yarn 3 total amount of yarn needed 300gr/520m/570yds - 4 stitch markers optional **finished size** - 14x15 35 5x38 cm not including strap ** you can choose to make the pattern as a rectangle or a square and work it as big as you d like if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //youtu be/ueprleeqe1e 3 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=726901&u=2493284&m=59159&urllink=www%2eknitpicks%2ecom%2fyarn%2fdishie%2fc%2f5420207&afftrack=c2ccablesbagravelry 4 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
